version_description:
App Updates/Bug Fixes
- Added new “Add Device” screen
- Added new connection method: “Ethernet WiFi Setup”. This method allows you to add your Amcrest IP camera to the app using an Ethernet cable initially, and then adds your camera to WiFi by the end of the process.
- Added a new WiFi scan function to aid initial setup. The WiFi scan function allows you to see all available wireless networks from within the app.
- Modified the WiFi Configuration Setup to include an alternative setup method.

1. Improved setup process
2. Added Audio Sync setup process
3. Added Walkthrough/Wizard for Basic Features
4. Added review request feature
5. Improved menu structure
6. Added Configuration Center

1. Improved setup process.
2. Fixed notification issue.
3. Fixed iphone 4/4s compatible issue.

1) Fixed Ethernet WiFi Setup Bug
2) Fixed Motion Detection Schedule Bug
3) Improved WiFi Config Setup Performance
4) Fixed Landscape Rotation Bug
5) Other Bug Fixes

1) Optimized P2P Library Compatibility with iOS 10.2
2) Solved the Issue Regarding T-Mobile Connectivity
3) Solved the "Login Timed Out" issue on AT&T
4) Added Motion Detection Settings Shortcut on Main Page
5) Optimized the Playback Menu
6) Optimized the Ethernet WiFi Setup Method

- Reverted changes made to P2P enhancements from the last update due to some users having connectivity issues.

- Users who are unable to rotate the app to landscape view, please update the firmware on your camera and try setting it up again in the app, which should fix the issue. This bug will be resolved in the next update.

- For any app related issues, please email apps@amcrest.com with the problem you face along with your phone model, carrier, and phone's software version so we can assist as soon as possible.

- Resolved an issue where landscape view did not work properly.

- For any app related issues, please email apps@amcrest.com with the problem you face along with your phone model, carrier, and phone's software version so we can assist as soon as possible.

- Resolved an issue where users who utilized the HTTP port on the IP/Domain connection method could not connect to their devices.

- If you are having trouble connecting over LTE or 4G data after an app update, go to the Settings app, then General > Reset > Reset Network Settings. This should refresh your carrier's network data, and should resolve any connection issues you may have.

- For any app related issues, please email apps@amcrest.com with the problem you face along with your phone model, carrier, and phone's software version so we can assist as soon as possible.

- Fixed an issue with T-Mobile connectivity on iOS version 10.3.
- If you are having trouble connecting over LTE or 4G data after an app update, go to the Settings app, then General > Reset > Reset Network Settings. This should refresh your carrier's network data, and should resolve any connection issues you may have.
- For any app related issues, please email apps@amcrest.com with the problem you face along with your phone model, carrier, and phone's software version so we can assist as soon as possible.
